Package view

Class InternalPetriFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JInternalFrame
view.InternalPetriFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, view.AccessibilityGraphViewListener
public class InternalPetriFrame
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
implements view.AccessibilityGraphViewListener
class that represents an internal frame for displaying petrinets and batch analysis results.
Author:
Alexander Steinberg
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • InternalPetriFrame

      InternalPetriFrame​(java.lang.String title, view.InternalPetriFrameListener listener)
      Constructor for InternalPetriFrame class, a kind of JInternalFrame for displaying petrinets and batch analyses.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the internal frame
      listener - the AccessibilityGraphViewListener to set

  • Method Details

    • initializeInternalPetriFrame

      void initializeInternalPetriFrame​(model.Petrinet petrinet, model.AccessibilityGraph accessibilityGraph, org.graphstream.ui.view.ViewerListener viewerListener)
      initializes the internal petri frame as a frame to display a petrinet and its corresponding accessibility graph. Sets the petrinet and accessibilitygraph to display by its views, as well as a listener that listens for mouse events on these views.
      Parameters:
      petrinet - the displayed petrinet
      accessibilityGraph - the displayed accessibilityGraph
      viewerListener - the ViewerListener to be registered

    • initializeInternalAnalysisFrame

      void initializeInternalAnalysisFrame​(model.Petrinet petrinet)
      initializes the internal petri frame as a frame to display a batch analysis. Sets the petrinet to use for batch analysis.
      Parameters:
      petrinet - the petrinet to use for batch analysis

      set the initial size of the frame to fill the remaining horizontal and vertical space.

    • enableTokenButtons

      public void enableTokenButtons​(boolean enablePlus, boolean enableMinus)
      Enable token buttons in toolbar.
      Parameters:
      enablePlus - true if add token button should be enabled, false otherwise
      enableMinus - true of subtract token button should be enabled, false otherwise
